snippet.title: The Fan Game - The Secret of Monkey Island  - RECODED -  Trailer 2021 -
snippet.description:
The Fan Game - The Secret of Monkey Island  - RECODED -  

A timeline never seen before, where the choices can branch out into infinite realities o endless possibility, creating alternate puzzles from the ones you know.
Young pirate wanna-be Guybrush Threepwood sets out to pass the Three Trials, woo the governess Elaine Marley, reach the fabled Monkey Island and vanquish the nefarious ghost pirate LeChuck. 

30 Years of Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge....
Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge turned thirty.  
  
The extraordinary second chapter of the series of "point and click" graphic adventures - born thanks to the intuition and the inimitable comic streak of Ron Gilbert, Dave Grossman and Tim Schafer (LucasArts), continues to thrill many nostalgic players even today.  
To celebrate this important anniversary with great fanfare, Daniele Spadoni invite you play at a timeline never seen before, an adventure that will have no end.

Voice Actors
Man Working Construction: Joshua of Weird Gaming Adventure
Employee of a video game Company: Kristian Ziegenmeyer

-----------------------------
AVAILABLE NOW !!
----------------------------
DOWNLOAD
https://www.deviantart.com/spadoni-production/art/TFG-The-Secret-of-Monkey-Island-RECODED-893487909

SITE
https://danielespadoni82.blogspot.com/
-----------------------------
